title: 24-Hour Fitness Center, Elevators, Pet Friendly!
posting_body: At Kinect @ Lynnwood, we take your health and safety seriously, which is why we are offering online applications for our brand-new studio, one, and two bedroom apartments.
Contact us to schedule a tour, or if you have any questions, we’re happy to help!
Kinect @ Lynnwood blends luxe upscale style with convenient amenities and stellar location in Lynnwood, Washington.
Located by the Alderwood Mall, your new studio, one, or two bedroom apartment puts you in the epicenter of shopping, dining, and fun.
Close to I-5, Seattle is an easy commute away for work or play.
Our pet-friendly community is brand-new, with open-concept layouts perfect for the next movie night.
Onsite, you’ll have access to a terrace courtyard with grilling stations for your next summer barbecue.
Experience the best in life when you make the move to Kinect @ Lynnwood.
Gated Parking Garage w/ Charging Stations
Upper-Level Courtyard w/ Lounge, Fire Pit, & Grilling Stations
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
